{{{

//mexican cities translated into Japanese
PREFIX co: <http://www.geonames.org/countries/#>

SELECT  ?name ?pop
WHERE
  { 
     ?city gn:inCountry co:MX .
      ?city gn:population ?pop .
     ?city gn:name ?name
   }

//mexican cities translated into Japanese
PREFIX co: <http://www.geonames.org/countries/#>

SELECT  ?name ?pop
WHERE
  { 
     ?city gn:inCountry co:MX .
      ?city gn:population ?pop .
     ?city gn:alternateName ?name
  FILTER ( lang(?name) = "ja")

  }




// Airports around London

PREFIX co: <http://www.geonames.org/countries/#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
PREFIX geo: <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#>
 

SELECT ?link ?name ?lat ?lon
WHERE  {   
   ?link gs:within(51.139725 -0.895386 51.833232 0.645447) .  
   ?link gn:name ?name .  
   ?link gn:featureCode gn:S.AIRP .
   ?link geo:lat ?lat .
   ?link geo:long ?lon
}

// cities in Japan with more than a million people
PREFIX co: <http://www.geonames.org/countries/#>
PREFIX geo: <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  

SELECT  ?name ?pop ?lat ?lon
WHERE
  { 
    ?city gn:inCountry co:JP .
    ?city gn:name ?name .
    ?city gn:population ?pop .
    ?city geo:lat ?lat .
    ?city geo:long ?lon .
    FILTER( xsd:int(?pop) > 1000000)

  }


}}}
